item.title: How Hugo worked for me??

item.description: Amigos! Jino here. profession--> Devops Engineer. I am a Tech surfer. My fav OS is Arch Linux. And loves programming and configuring low/high level systems. Python, Linux and DevOps are my strengths. Music makes me relax and concentrate. Playing football is yet another stuff I do to pass time. Lastly, I am a UKELELE player (beginner).
